summary:
Qualcomm is an American tech company based in San Diego, California. It was founded in 1985 and is known for making wireless technology, like the chips inside your phone. The company owns important patents for things like 5G and 4G networks.

Qualcomm started with satellite communications and then moved into mobile phone technology. They had some legal issues with their patents but are now a big part of the tech industry, making chips and software for many devices.
title: Qualcomm
